name: Sebastian "Baz" B. - Mini Game Pandora's Box
name_original: Sebastian "Baz" B. - Mini Game Pandora's Box
description:
Sebastian "Baz" B. - Mini Game Pandora's Box is a puzzle game developed by Game-U. It was originally released in 2021.
Sebastian "Baz" B. - Mini Game Pandora's Box is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
